setConflictStrategy(int).Description: Sets a conflict resolution strategy for this action. The resulting behavior depends on the strategy selected. Check documentation on accepted values (@B_com#google#android#gms#drive#ExecutionOptions#CONFLICT_STRATEGY_OVERWRITE_REMOTE_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#ExecutionOptions#CONFLICT_STRATEGY_KEEP_REMOTE_E@) for more details.

Parameters: the tag that will be returned when a completion event is delivered through @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#events#DriveEventService_E@. Must not be null, and the length can never exceed @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#ExecutionOptions#MAX_TRACKING_TAG_STRING_LENGTH_E@
setTrackingTag(java.lang.String).Description: Sets a client-defined string that will be returned to the client through a completion notification on @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#events#DriveEventService_E@ after this particular action either succeeds or fails when applied on the server. A notification will only be delivered if @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#ExecutionOptions#Builder#setNotifyOnCompletion_E@ is called. This tag may contain any information that will be helpful to the caller in the event of a conflict or a failure to apply an action on the server, for example, a commit identifier or a delta representing the changes made in the commit.

Parameters: true if the API should deliver notifications about the completion of this event to the client's @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#events#DriveEventService_E@, false otherwise
setNotifyOnCompletion(boolean).Description: Sets whether the client should be notified when the action associated with these @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#ExecutionOptions_E@ is applied on the server. When clients set notify to true, they must also implement a @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#events#DriveEventService_E@ to receive the completion event. See @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#events#DriveEventService_E@ for more details on how the service should be implemented and added to the manifest.

ClassDesc: A builder for creating a new @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#ExecutionOptions_E@.
